means: 苦行者，禁欲者，禁欲主义者

sentence.Network_en: The monks lived a very ascetic life.
sentence.Network_cn: 僧侣过着很清苦的生活。

sentence.Network_en: The hermit followed an ascetic life - style.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个隐士过的是苦行生活.

sentence.Network_en: He left the luxuries of the court for the life of an ascetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他放弃了宫廷的奢华，过起了清贫的生活。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... artlessness 朴质>都市风格 ascetic 苦行的>奢侈的 ascetic 禁欲者，苦行者>酒色之徒.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... ascetic 苦行的>奢侈的 ascetic 禁欲者，苦行者>酒色之徒 assiduous 勤勉的>玩忽职守的/散漫的.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... ascendant ? n. 优势 ascetic ? adj. 禁欲的 aseptic ? adj. 无菌的，洁净的.
GRE单词分类总结之名词--人物篇_新浪教育_新浪网 ... 34. artisan: 技工。 35. ascetic: 苦行僧。 36. aspirant: 有抱负者。.

list.abs: an analysis of the dynamic ascetic function of practical writing ., 应用文写作动态审美功能探析.
he inspired other ascetics and is called Simeon the Elder to distinguish him from a 6th-century stylite of the same name .他激励了其他的苦行修士，人们称他为老圣西门以区别于6世纪时一个同样名字的柱头修士。
with his ascetic life and his conduct free from compromises in face of the corruption of the powerful , he evokes the severe figure of John the Baptist .他的苦行生活和不向腐败权势低头的行为使他赢得了像施洗若翰一样的声誉。
of ascetic life , he bag of bones and very weak .六年苦行，他瘦得皮包骨头，身体非常虚弱。
ascetic 禁欲主义的ascetical theology 苦行神学asceticism 禁欲主义
...灵修神学灵修神学（spiritual theology） ，或称为克修神学（ascetical theology） ，该神学集中在人的内在转变上，这转变是由于信仰和恩宠（天主圣神）临在于人们的心灵中而产生的效果。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin asceticus or Greek askētikos, from askētēs 'monk', from askein 'to exercise'

entry.tran: （通常因为宗教信仰）苦行的，禁欲的
entry.def: An ascetic person has a way of life that is simple and strict, usually because of their religious beliefs.

example.ex: She has never been close to her ascetic, workaholic father.
example.tran: 她从来没有和她那个清心寡欲、只顾工作的父亲亲近过。
过着苦行修道生活的教士们

means.word_mean: 1. practices self denial as spiritual discipline
1. pertaining to or characteristic of an ascetic or the practice of rigorous self-discipline;

sentences.sentence: "Be systematically ascetic...do...something for no other reason than that you would rather not do it"- William James

auth_sentence.content: These ascetic values, the noncapitalist, nonmaterialist values.
auth_sentence.res_content: These ascetic values, the noncapitalist, nonmaterialist values.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These ascetic values, the noncapitalist, nonmaterialist values.

auth_sentence.content: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.
auth_sentence.res_content: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.

auth_sentence.content: He wore a perfectly plain, almost ascetic dark suit.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wore a perfectly plain, almost ascetic dark suit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wore a perfectly plain, almost ascetic dark suit.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或科学"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: academy专科院校,研究院+ic……的→academic学院的
ascet练习+ic……的→adj.禁欲的 n.苦行者
elast+ic……的→adj.弹性的
electron电子+ic……的→adj.电子的
fan狂热者+at+ic……的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: magnet磁体,磁铁+ic……的→adj.磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
metr=meter米+ic……的→adj.米制的,公制的
prosa=prose散文+ic……的→像散文一样平淡,无趣
sept感染+ic……的→adj.受感染的,腐败的
stat站+ic……的→站着的,静止的
symmetry[n.对称]+ic……的→symmetric相称性的
vitriol硫酸盐,刻薄话+ic……的→adj.刻薄的,强烈的
geography地理[学]+ic人或科学→geographic地理[学]的
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
psyche灵魂;精神+del看+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.引起幻觉的 n.迷幻药
sopor迷睡,昏睡,酣睡+if+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药

sto+ic人或科学→来自古希腊斯多葛派学,主张以苦为乐
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
an无+esthet感觉+ic某种药或医学有关→n.麻醉剂

emet呕吐+ic某种药或医学有关→n.催吐药

sopor迷睡,昏睡,酣睡+if+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药
mim模仿+ic人或科学→v.模仿,戏弄 n.模仿他人言行的人
